derivation: perhaps by permutation for the feminine of H5566 (סֶמֶל) (through the idea of a cover assuming the shape of the object beneath);
outline: 1. wrapper, mantle, covering garment, garments, clothes, raiment, a cloth
kjv_def: apparel, cloth(-es, -ing), garment, raiment. Compare H8008 (שַׂלְמָה).
